lead_paragraph: Lynn University’s 2005 Division II softball national championship will be vacated after the N.C.A.A. announced sanctions yesterday. The N.C.A.A. found that the former coach, Thomas Macera, made improper payments of $3,188.61 to pay for tuition and books for two players in 2005, the N.C.A.A. said. The N.C.A.A. did not refer to Macera by name, but said the former head coach committed the violations.
